page.title: 08Off to school!
page.content: Within the area there are two village primary schools catering for upto 400 children from the local community. The majority of children walk to school from neighbouring housing estates. {Birchanger C.of E.Primary}:-a small village school in the centre of an agricultural area with a small housing estate to the east of the school. {St.Mary's C.of E.(Aided) Primary}:- catering for upto 250 children from the village.The school has close links with {St.John's Church. Children transferring to{Secondary {Schools}have the choice of 12 schools to enter into in Essex/Hertfordshire. {Stansted Mountfitchet High School}:- a Secondary School to the east of the village. Between St.Mary's School and the church is{Peter Kirk School,}a school for physically handicapped children.
